## Materials and Methods | Selection and preparation of data { .smaller}
Data set of 192 observations, with 10 attributes after cleaning.

- Collected from the 1985 book 'Data' (@Andrews1985).
- Originated from a 1981 study (@Percy1981). 

Attributes (11):

<font size="3">

Observation Number, ID, Age, Month, Year, Creatine kinase (CK), Hemopexin (H), Lactate dehydroginase (LD) and Pyruvate kinase (PK)
</font>
<br>
<br>
<font size="3">
In augment, season and carrier was added
</font>

<div class="notes">
Creatine kinase (CK), Hemopexin (H), Lactate dehydroginase (LD) and Pyruvate kinase (PK)

##  Materials and Methods | Data set { .smaller}

```{r include=FALSE}
library('tidyverse')
```
```{r echo=FALSE}

                 col_types = cols(carrier = col_factor()))
data %>%
  filter(ID < 640 & ID > 630) %>% 
  select(-ObservationNumber)
```
